name: 纳米激素
description: 选择一个除自己外的友方，使其+3防御力，且其造成的所有伤害（无论任何形式）+1
code: function executeSkill(context) { const sourcePiece = context.piece; const targetAlly = selectTarget({ type: 'piece', range: 10, filter: 'ally' }); if (!targetAlly || targetAlly.needsTargetSelection) { return targetAlly; } if (targetAlly.instanceId === sourcePiece.instanceId) { return { message: '不能对自己使用纳米激素', success: false }; } targetAlly.defense = targetAlly.defense + 3; const statusId = 'nano-boost-' + Date.now(); addStatusEffectById(targetAlly.instanceId, { id: statusId, type: 'nano-boost', currentDuration: -1, intensity: 1, value: 3, relatedRules: ['rule-nano-boost-damage'] }); addRuleById(targetAlly.instanceId, 'rule-nano-boost-damage'); addSkillById(targetAlly.instanceId, 'nano-boost-damage'); return { message: sourcePiece.name + '对' + targetAlly.name + '使用纳米激素，防御力+3，伤害+1', success: true }; }
previewCode: function calculatePreview(piece, skillDef) { return { description: '使目标友方防御力+3，造成的所有伤害+1', expectedValues: { buff: 3 } }; }
